name: Coinrule
headline: Coinrule Automates Your Crypto and Stock Investments
description:
Coinrule Catches the Next Market Opportunity on Your Behalf by Automating Your Investments.

Coinrule's previous Crowdfunding Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nnYJ4PnSvnU

founders.name: Gabriele Musella, CEO, Founder
founders.description:
Design-Driven Entrepreneur. Prior to Coinrule, I worked at UBS Bank, Nokia, NHS, Vodafone, British Government, WPP, Lloyds Bank, etc. I hold a BS/MS from the Polytechnic of Milan, was a Visiting Scholar at MIT, and took part in business programs at LSE and Harvard University. 

Currently, I am a Mentor at the Google Accelerator, Angel Investor and since 2018 the CEO & Co-founder of Coinrule.

founders.name: Oleg Giberstein, Founder
founders.description: I am Cofounder & COO of Coinrule, a platform that helps retail investors catch market opportunities through automated trading. I have previously worked in Banking and Risk roles at Citigroup and helped develop a Startup Ecosystem in Palestine for the Portland Trust. When I am not building Coinrule, you can find me exploring the latest DeFi protocols and on Twitter.

founders.name: Zdenek Hofler, Founder
founders.description:
I am a passionate entrepreneur, infrastructure & software architect and a fullstack web developer with strong GDPR knowledge. A project-oriented person who loves challenges and building of interesting projects.

My life story is long and funny, ask me when we meet over a glass of wine or beer.

# Create Trading Bots, Follow Smart Investors
Catch the next market opportunity and compete with professional traders

[ ![Tech Crunch](https://coinrule.com/pic/tc.png)](https://coinrule.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2021/08/31/here-are-all-the-companies-from-y-combinators-summer-2021-demo-day-part-1/>) [ ![Forbes](https://coinrule.com/pic/forbes.png)](https://coinrule.com/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/davidprosser/2021/09/27/coinrule-bags-big-name-investors-for-its-automated-crypto-trading-platform/>) [ ![Y Combinator](https://coinrule.com/pic/yc.png)](https://coinrule.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/coinrule>) [ ![Business Insider](https://coinrule.com/pic/bi.png)](https://coinrule.com/<https:/www.businessinsider.com/pitch-deck-coinrule-2-2-million-y-combinator-2021-9?r=US&IR=T>) [ ![Yahoo Finance](https://coinrule.com/pic/yahoo.png)](https://coinrule.com/<https:/finance.yahoo.com/news/meet-coinrule-bitcoin-baby-sitters-172633404.html>)

## Create Automated Trading Rules, 24/7
Set custom automated trades and never miss a rally or get caught in a dip. Coinrule obsessively seeks out effective market indicators to enable smart allocation of funds while putting you in control of your trading machine.
[**Start for Free**](https://coinrule.com/<https:/web.coinrule.com/register>)
## Test Rule Performance on Historical Data
STRATEGY
Buy The Dip In Bull Market Buy The Dip Multi-Level Ride The Trend Maximized Crossing Moving Averages Low Volatility Buy And Sell
INITIAL AMOUNT
LENGTH OF INVESTMENT
$1750 .00
### **Test Your Strategy Today**
[Start Free](https://coinrule.com/<https:/web.coinrule.com/register>)
## Choose Among 250+ Rules or Build Your Own
  * ![Template Strategy](https://coinrule.com/css/images/templateStrategiesList__template1.jpg)
  * ![Template Strategy](https://coinrule.com/css/images/templateStrategiesList__template2.jpg)

  * ![Template Strategy](https://coinrule.com/css/images/templateStrategiesList__template8.jpg)


[**Start Free**](https://coinrule.com/<https:/web.coinrule.com/register>)
## Securely Trade Across Exchanges
Coinrule is a beginner-friendly and safe platform to send automated trading instructions to your favorite exchanges, including Binance, Coinbase Pro, Kraken, etc. We don't ask for private keys or withdrawal rights. 
[**Start Free**](https://coinrule.com/<https:/web.coinrule.com/register>)
## Getting Started Is Easy!
Sign Up Today or Simply Get Market Updates In Your Inbox 
Email* 
Get Updates 
Marketing by 
[](https://coinrule.com/<https:/www.activecampaign.com>)
## Create Rules Based on Popular Indicators
Each rule can be set to run as fast as every minute and executes within seconds. New indicators are added every week and announced on our [blog.](https://coinrule.com/<blog/>)
**Trigger actions when market changes** Based on clear indicators 
**No code required** As simple as IFTTT 
**Manage volatility** Maximize profits

generated_description:
Coinrule is a fintech company based in London that was founded in 2018, emerging from Y Combinator’s Batch S21. The core mission of Coinrule is simple yet powerful: “Coinrule Automates Your Crypto and Stock Investments.” The platform provides an intuitive way for users to automate their trading strategies, making it easier to seize market opportunities without constantly monitoring the charts.

Initially conceived to take on the challenges of fast-paced trading, Coinrule enables users to set up automated trading rules that execute based on specific market conditions. This means users can participate in the trading scene effectively without needing extensive technical know-how. You could think of it as your personal trading assistant, working around the clock to catch that next market rally or protect you from downturns.

The team here is small but mighty, with 17 employees led by co-founders Gabriele Musella (CEO), Oleg Giberstein (COO), and Zdeněk Höfler (CTO). They emphasize a product that is user-friendly and secure—no need for users to divulge their private keys or withdrawal rights, which is a significant concern in the crypto space.

The platform supports trading across multiple popular exchanges like Binance, Coinbase Pro, and Kraken, allowing users to deploy automated strategies seamlessly. With over 250 pre-built trading rules and the ability to create custom ones, users can tailor their investment strategies to fit personal preferences and market dynamics.

Coinrule offers various pricing tiers catering to different levels of trading frequency and volume, starting from a free option for hobbyists to a business plan for professional users. This tiered system allows flexibility for users as their trading needs grow.

In terms of recognition, Coinrule has attracted attention from notable media outlets like Forbes and TechCrunch, affirming its position in the growing landscape of automated trading solutions. 

If you're interested in automating your trading on crypto and stock markets, Coinrule makes it easy to get started. You can sign up and create automated trading rules tailored to your investment strategy for free. Check them out at [Coinrule.com](https://coinrule.com) and begin your journey into automated trading today!
